title: Dragon Ball: Curse of the Blood Rubies
description: Goku and his friends must stop King Gurumes from destroying the city for blood rubies and gathering the seven Dragon Balls.
trivia: This movie is a retelling of the first story arc of the original Dragon Ball anime.

title: Dragon Ball: Sleeping Princess in Devil's Castle
description: Goku and Krillin want to be trained in martial arts by Master Roshi. He will only agree if they rescue the Sleeping Princess from Count Lucifer.
trivia: This movie introduces Krillin and provides a backstory for how he met Goku.

title: Dragon Ball: Mystical Adventure
description: Goku and Krillin are invited to a martial arts tournament in Mifan, where a desperate emperor needs help.
trivia: This movie is a fusion of the Red Ribbon Army and Tournament Sagas.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Dead Zone
description: Gohan is kidnapped by Garlic Jr.'s men so he can have Gohan's Dragon Ball to grant him immortality. Goku and friends try to stop him.
trivia: This movie is set before the events of Dragon Ball Z, making it the first Z movie.

title: Dragon Ball Z: The World's Strongest
description: The Z-Fighters must stop a mad scientist out to take over the world.
trivia: This movie features Dr. Kochin, an original character not seen in the series.

title: Dragon Ball Z: The Tree of Might
description: Aliens visit Earth to plant the Tree of Might, a plant that grants cosmic power by draining Earth's life force.
trivia: This movie introduces Turles, a Saiyan warrior who looks like Goku.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Lord Slug
description: A Super Namekian named Lord Slug comes to invade Earth, and only Goku can stop him.
trivia: This movie introduces the concept of a Super Namekian, a rare and powerful Namekian warrior.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Cooler's Revenge
description: Frieza's older brother Cooler travels to Earth to take revenge against Goku for Frieza's defeat on Namek.
trivia: Cooler is introduced as Frieza's stronger and more strategic older brother.

title: Dragon Ball Z: The Return of Cooler
description: Cooler resurrects as a robot and enslaves the people of New Namek. Goku and the gang must help.
trivia: This movie features Cooler's transformation into Meta-Cooler.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Super Android 13!
description: After Dr. Gero's death, Androids 13, 14, and 15 are activated to kill Goku, who fights them with help from Trunks, Piccolo, Vegeta, Krillin, and Gohan.
trivia: This movie introduces Android 13 and his transformations.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Broly - The Legendary Super Saiyan
description: Goku, Vegeta, and the Dragon Team search for the Legendary Super Saiyan, a powerful and destructive warrior.
trivia: Broly's character became one of the most popular in the Dragon Ball series.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Bojack Unbound
description: Bojack, a demon freed when King Kai's planet was destroyed, threatens Earth. Gohan must save the planet without Goku.
trivia: This movie focuses on Gohan's growth and his battle against Bojack.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Broly - Second Coming
description: Broly, the Legendary Super Saiyan, has survived and returns to Earth, forcing Goku's sons to fight him.
trivia: Broly's survival and return is a key event in the movie.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Bio-Broly
description: Bio-Broly, a clone of Broly, is created by a mad scientist and wreaks havoc until Goten, Trunks, and Android 18 stop him.
trivia: This movie is the third in the Broly trilogy.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Fusion Reborn
description: The Other World's order collapses, causing evil beings to return. Goku and Vegeta must fuse to defeat Janemba, a powerful demon.
trivia: This movie introduces Gogeta, the fusion of Goku and Vegeta.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Wrath of the Dragon
description: Goku and the Z-Fighters face off against Hirudegarn, a giant monster released from a magic box.
trivia: This movie introduces Tapion, a warrior from another planet.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Gods
description: Beerus, the God of Destruction, awakens after years of slumber. Goku must attain the power of a Super Saiyan God to stop him.
trivia: This movie marked the return of Dragon Ball Z to the big screen after a long hiatus.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F'
description: Frieza is resurrected and trains to surpass Goku. Goku and Vegeta must stop him before he destroys Earth.
trivia: This movie reintroduces Frieza as a formidable opponent with a new transformation, Golden Frieza.

title: Dragon Ball Super: Broly
description: Goku and Vegeta face off against the legendary Saiyan warrior Broly, who proves to be a formidable foe.
trivia: This movie reimagines Broly's character and integrates him into the Dragon Ball Super canon.

title: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero
description: The Red Ribbon Army returns with two new Androids, Gamma 1 and Gamma 2, who challenge Goku and his friends.
trivia: This movie focuses more on Gohan and Piccolo, showcasing their growth and new transformations.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Bardock â€“ The Father of Goku
description: Bardock, Goku's father, fights to save his race from extinction at the hands of Frieza.
trivia: This special explores the origins of Goku's father, Bardock.

title: Dragon Ball Z: The History of Trunks
description: This special explains the future timeline and how Trunks became a warrior.
trivia: This special explores the bleak future where Goku and most of the Z-Fighters are dead.

title: Dragon Ball: The Path to Power
description: A retelling of Goku's early adventures as he searches for the Dragon Balls and battles the Red Ribbon Army.
trivia: This movie was made to commemorate the 10th anniversary of the Dragon Ball anime.

title: Dragon Ball GT: A Hero's Legacy
description: Goku Jr., the great-great-grandson of Goku, embarks on a journey to find the Dragon Balls to save his grandmother Pan.
trivia: This special is set 100 years after the end of Dragon Ball GT.

title: Dragon Ball: The Path to Power
description: A retelling of Goku's early adventures as he searches for the Dragon Balls and battles the Red Ribbon Army.
trivia: This movie was made to commemorate the 10th anniversary of the Dragon Ball anime.

title: Dragon Ball Z: The Plan to Eradicate the Super Saiyans
description: Dr. Raichi, a Tsufurujin scientist, creates a machine that generates hate, aiming to wipe out the Saiyans.
trivia: This movie was originally a video game adaptation and was later adapted into an anime special.

title: Dragon Ball Z: The Return of Cooler
description: Cooler resurrects as a robot and enslaves the people of New Namek. Goku and the gang must help.
trivia: This movie features Cooler's transformation into Meta-Cooler.

title: Dragon Ball Z: The History of Trunks
description: This special explains the future timeline and how Trunks became a warrior.
trivia: This special explores the bleak future where Goku and most of the Z-Fighters are dead.
